summary: An invoice from Oakbrook Counseling Center to the law firm Edwards Pottinger LLC for six individual therapy sessions provided to an unspecified client, totaling $975. The invoice is addressed to attorneys Maria Cardenal and Maria Kelljchian and requests payment to counselor Shelley Kavanagh.

persons.name: Shelley Kavanagh
persons.context: The therapist providing the individual therapy sessions billed in this invoice and the person to whom payment should be made.

persons.name: Maria Cardenal
persons.context: One of the attorneys at the law firm billed for the therapy services, listed as a recipient of the invoice.

persons.name: Maria Kelljchian
persons.context: One of the attorneys at the law firm billed for the therapy services, listed alongside Maria Cardenal as a recipient of the invoice.

connections.description: Both are attorneys at the same law firm, Edwards Pottinger LLC, and are jointly addressed on the invoice.
Kavanagh's counseling center is billing Cardenal's law firm for therapy services, indicating a professional service relationship.
Kavanagh's counseling center is billing Kelljchian's law firm for therapy services, indicating a professional service relationship.

events.title: Therapy Services Invoice Issued
events.description: Oakbrook Counseling Center issued an invoice to the law firm Edwards Pottinger LLC for six individual therapy sessions.

locations: Oakbrook Counseling Center, 4804 West Commercial Blvd, Tamarac, FL 33319
Edwards Pottinger LLC, 425 North Andrews Ave Suite 2, Fort Lauderdale, FL 33301
keyFacts: The law firm Edwards Pottinger LLC was billed for six individual therapy sessions provided by Oakbrook Counseling Center in November 2020.
The therapy sessions were likely provided to a client represented by the law firm, though the client's identity is not specified in the invoice.
The invoice indicates a financial relationship between a counseling service provider and a law firm involved in the Epstein case.
The total amount billed was $975 for sessions occurring at a standard rate of $150 per hour, with one extended 1.5-hour session at $225.
